languages.text: {n}Идира щелкает шеей.{/n} "Ну конечно. Сначала вы нам по мелочи наврали, а завтра, глядишь, всадите торпеду в бок с этого вашего корабля... если он, конечно, не развалится от чиха кормчего".

{n}Idira cracks her neck.{/n} "Sure, no problem. Today you tell us a little lie, tomorrow you stick a torpedo in our side from that ship of yours... if it doesn't fall apart the moment our helmsman sneezes in its general direction."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира щелкает шеей.{/n} "Ну конечно. Сначала вы нам по мелочи наврали, а завтра, глядишь, всадите торпеду в бок с этого вашего корабля... если он, конечно, не развалится от чиха кормчего".

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira cracks her neck.{/n} "Sure, no problem. Today you tell us a little lie, tomorrow you'll stick a torpedo in our side from that ship of yours... if she doesn't fall apart the moment our helmsman sneezes in her general direction."

{n}Idira cracks her neck.{/n} "Sure, no problem. Today you tell us a little lie, tomorrow you'll stick a torpedo in our side from that ship of yours... if she doesn't fall apart the moment our helmsman sneezes in her general direction."

{n}Idira cracks her neck.{/n} "Sure, no problem. Today you tell us a little lie, tomorrow you'll stick a torpedo in our side from that ship of yours... if it doesn't fall apart the moment our helmsman sneezes in its general direction."

{n}Idira cracks her neck.{/n} "Sure, no problem. Today you tell us a little lie, tomorrow you'll stick a torpedo in our side from that ship of yours... if it doesn't fall apart the moment our helmsman sneezes in its general direction."

{n}Idira cracks her neck.{/n} "Sure, no problem. Today you tell us a little lie, tomorrow you stick a torpedo in our side from that ship of yours... if it doesn't fall apart the moment our helmsman sneezes in its general direction."

{n}Idira cracks her neck.{/n} "Sure, no problem. Today you tell us a little lie, tomorrow you stick a torpedo in our side from that ship of yours... if it doesn't fall apart the moment our helmsman sneezes in its general direction."

languages.text: {n}Idira lässt ihr Genick knacken.{/n} "Klar, kein Problem ... Heute erzählt Ihr uns eine kleine Lüge, morgen steckt Ihr uns aus Eurem Schiff einen Torpedo in die Seite ... falls er nicht auseinanderfällt, sobald unser Steuermann in seine Richtung niest."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira cracks her neck.{/n} "Sure, no problem. Today you tell us a little lie, tomorrow you stick a torpedo in our side from that ship of yours... if it doesn't fall apart the moment our helmsman sneezes in its general direction."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira lässt ihr Genick knacken.{/n} "Klar, kein Problem ... Heute erzählt Ihr uns eine kleine Lüge, morgen steckt Ihr uns aus Eurem Schiff einen Torpedo in die Seite ... falls er nicht auseinanderfällt, sobald unser Steuermann in seine Richtung niest."

languages.text: « Mais bien sûr, {n}rétorque Idira.{/n} Aujourd'hui, c'est un petit mensonge, et demain, vous nous balancerez une torpille en plein flanc depuis votre vaisseau... s'il n'explose pas au premier éternuement de notre timonier dans sa direction. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira cracks her neck.{/n} "Sure, no problem. Today you tell us a little lie, tomorrow you stick a torpedo in our side from that ship of yours... if it doesn't fall apart the moment our helmsman sneezes in its general direction."

traits.locale_text: « Mais bien sûr, {n}rétorque Idira.{/n} Aujourd'hui, c'est un petit mensonge, et demain, vous nous balancerez une torpille en plein flanc depuis votre vaisseau... s'il n'explose pas au premier éternuement de notre timonier dans sa direction. »

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉转了转脖子。{/n}“是啊，肯定没问题。今天跟我们撒个小谎，明天就能从船上朝我们发射几枚鱼雷……假如咱们的舵手朝他那艘破船打个喷嚏，它还没散架的话。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira cracks her neck.{/n} "Sure, no problem. Today you tell us a little lie, tomorrow you stick a torpedo in our side from that ship of yours... if it doesn't fall apart the moment our helmsman sneezes in its general direction."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉转了转脖子。{/n}“是啊，肯定没问题。今天跟我们撒个小谎，明天就能从船上朝我们发射几枚鱼雷……假如咱们的舵手朝他那艘破船打个喷嚏，它还没散架的话。”

languages.text: {n}イディラが首を鳴らす。{/n}「ええ、いいわよ。今日はあたいたちに小さな嘘をついて、明日はその船の魚雷をこっちに撃ち込む気なんでしょ…操舵手がくしゃみをした瞬間にバラバラにならなければの話だけどね」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira cracks her neck.{/n} "Sure, no problem. Today you tell us a little lie, tomorrow you stick a torpedo in our side from that ship of yours... if it doesn't fall apart the moment our helmsman sneezes in its general direction."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラが首を鳴らす。{/n}「ええ、問題ないわ。今日あなたは私たちに小さな嘘をつき、明日船の魚雷を私たちのところに置いていく…操舵手がちょっと触った瞬間壊れなきゃの話だけどね」
{n}イディラが首を鳴らす。{/n}「ええ、いいわよ。今日はあたいたちに小さな嘘をついて、明日はその船の魚雷をこっちに撃ち込む気なんでしょ…操舵手がくしゃみをした瞬間にバラバラにならなければの話だけどね」

languages.text: {n}Idira hace crujir su cuello.{/n} «Sí, claro. Hoy nos cuenta una pequeña mentira y mañana nos dispara un torpedo desde esa nave suya... a no ser que nuestro maestro timonel la haga añicos con un simple estornudo antes».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira cracks her neck.{/n} "Sure, no problem. Today you tell us a little lie, tomorrow you stick a torpedo in our side from that ship of yours... if it doesn't fall apart the moment our helmsman sneezes in its general direction."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira hace crujir su cuello.{/n} «Sí, claro. Hoy nos cuenta una pequeña mentira y mañana nos dispara un torpedo desde esa nave suya... a no ser que nuestro maestro timonel la haga añicos con un simple estornudo antes».

languages.text: {n}İdira, boynunu kıtlatıyor.{/n} "Tabii ya, lafı mı olur? Bugün pembe bir yalan söylersiniz, yarın da geminizden böğrümüze torpido yapıştırırsınız olur biter. Bizim serdümen o taraflara doğru hapşırsa gemi falan kalmayacak ya neyse."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira cracks her neck.{/n} "Sure, no problem. Today you tell us a little lie, tomorrow you stick a torpedo in our side from that ship of yours... if it doesn't fall apart the moment our helmsman sneezes in its general direction."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira, boynunu kıtlatıyor.{/n} "Tabii ya, lafı mı olur? Bugün pembe bir yalan söylersiniz, yarın da geminizden böğrümüze torpido yapıştırırsınız olur biter. Bizim serdümen o taraflara doğru hapşırsa gemi falan kalmayacak ya neyse."
